text:
Snuuper.com//Santiago, Chile//On-site//Fulltime//Startup expanding to other countries//

Our mobile App for iOS and Android enable gather information and resolve tasks using private workforce or using our community (crowd). We have been growing the last two years and now we're expanding to other countries.

The roles we're hiring for:

- Android Junior Developer - Android Senior Developer - iOS Junior Developer

Interested please contact us to hiring@snuuper.com
